text: Ragnhild Hartmann Varmbo (24 June 1886 - 4 January 1982) was a Norwegian politician for the Conservative Party. She served as a deputy representative to the Norwegian Parliament from the Market towns of Sør-Trøndelag and Nord- Trøndelag counties during the terms 1937-1945 and 1945-1949\. She worked as a school teacher. She was a cousin of Olaf Amundsen.Olaf Amundsen biography at the Norwegian Social Science Data Services ==References== * Category:1886 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Conservative Party (Norway) politicians Category:Deputy members of the Storting Category:Women members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian women politicians Category:20th- century Norwegian politicians
title: Ragnhild Hartmann Varmbo
